column5: Why do I keep seeing drivers looking down at their crotches and laughing? Seems like half the drivers on the 401 are doing it.  Male and females!
They think no one can tell what they are doing.
I watched a dude sideswipe the jersey barrier at 100kph on the 401 a few weeks ago.... Just kept on going till the next exit.  Wonder what he was doing....... Lucky he didn't kill someone!
One more reason I hate the 401!! I'm glad the weekend is over, because a lot of those dumbasses were on the roads and water around here. Always in a rush, and can't drive!  S.
I typically had girls laugh at my crotch.. haven't tried it on the fellas
I would guess majority are trying to hide that they are texting while driving and maybe they read a funny message.

Kinda stupid to make a law stating no cell phones. We have that policy at work. Boy is there ever a lotta people laughing at their pockets or behind books, not a single person without a phone though... Hmmmmm...
